<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Standard record page">25f33276c3fd22109642f61ed4013131</macroponent><name>button_1/isHidden</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
	const subArray = api.data.look_up_multiple_records_1.results||[];

  const sessionUserId = api.context.session.user.sys_id;
	const alreadySubscribed = subArray.some(sub=> {
    return(
      sub.learner.value === sessionUserId
    );
  });
  return alreadySubscribed;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-03 17:08:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>674837d3c3b9e2109642f61ed401313d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>button_1/isHidden</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CourseHub" source="x_quo_coursehub">d7affc501bf0ded0afce657a234bcb67</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CourseHub">d7affc501bf0ded0afce657a234bcb67</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_674837d3c3b9e2109642f61ed401313d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-03 19:48:19</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
